posts.title: Hello World
posts.text: Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub. Quick StartCreate a new post1$ hexo new "My New Post" More info: Writing Run server1$ hexo server More info: Server Generate static files1$ hexo generate More info: Generating Deploy to remote sites1$ hexo deploy More info: Deployment

pages.text: Hi, my name is Tianshu Chen. I am curently a PhD candidate from the Envrionmental Research Institute at Shandong University. My research supervisors are Academician Wenxing Wang and Prof. Likun Xue. I have visited in the Cooperative Institute for Research in Environmental Sciences (CIRES) at University of Colorado Boulder, collaboration with Prof. Joost de Gouw. I am passionate about contributing to a further understanding of the chemical transformation of VOCs/nitrogen oxide in polluted air and numerical simulations of the production of ozone. My current research topic is quantifying the contribution from Volatile Chemical Product (VCP) emissions to ozone formation in Los Angeles. I am a fan of open source and serve as developer of FOQAT.
